name: MEC Reactor 10 Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Put some luxurious padding between you and the world. This self-inflating mattress is wide and thick, so it's super-comfortable when you're camping out for several nights or on chilly early- or late-season trips. Everything from the soft cover to the 10cm of cushy thickness is deluxe, but the price remains modest.Polyester jersey feels soft on skin.Non-slip surface on the underside prevents sliding.Foam has horizontal cut-outs to reduce weight and packed size while retaining insulation.Twin oversized valves make inflation and deflation easy.Save your breath: use the included pump sack for rapid inflation.Includes hook-and-loop straps to keep it rolled up and a repair kit.
